control_attributes.Control: SI-2 (6) REMOVAL OF PREVIOUS VERSIONS OF SOFTWARE / FIRMWARE
control_attributes.control_description: The organization removes [Assignment: organization-defined software and firmware components] after updated versions have been installed.
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system updates malicious code protection mechanisms only when directed by a privileged user.

Control Statement: The organization removes [Assignment: organization-defined software and firmware components] after updated versions have been installed.
Control Name: SI-2 (6) REMOVAL OF PREVIOUS VERSIONS OF SOFTWARE / FIRMWARE
